original_title: Raigam Tele’es: Ada Derana 24 documentary program wins Special Jury Award
original_body_lines: ‘Surakimu Budhu Sasuna’ a documentary programme on Ada Derana 24, produced by Wasanthi Nanayakkara, won Special Jury Award at Raigam Tele’es 2023 awards ceremony currently being held at the Shangri-La Hotel in Colombo.
